entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:25 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 7:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -40.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -44.4°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 27 February 2023
